basic.Peptide Name: Paneth cell-specific alpha-defensin 1 (DEFA1; horse defensin; houses, mammals, animals
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli [ATCC 11775 (MBC=0.4 µM); ATCC 25922 (MBC=0.4 µM); ATCC 35218 (MBC=0.4 µM)], E. coli D31 (MBC=0.8 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 11440 (MBC=3 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus [ATCC 6538 (MBC=0.8 µM); ATCC 12600 (MBC=1.5 µM)], Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990 (MBC=1.5 µM), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212 (MBC=6.1 µM), E. faecalis PEG 205 (wild-type) (MBC=3 µM), Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 12344 (MBC=0.8 µM), Bacillus megaterium ATCC 14581 (MBC=0.2 µM).Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 24433 (MIC=0.8 µM).
